channel.title: TOR:DFY on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:DFY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Insurance Firm Definity Financial Readies C$1 Billion Debt Sale
item.description: Definity Financial Corp. plans to sell around C$1 billion ($723 million) of debt in two parts as it prepares to close the acquisition of Travelers Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.
